content.rendered:
110% Lowest Price Match Guarantee
We’ll beat any legitimate UPC code seller’s price by 10%.

At SnapUPC.com, we keep our prices competitive. This means you can always be rest-assured that you are always getting the best price. On top of always receiving the best price we have a 110% lowest price guarantee. If you find a lower priced UPC package from a legitimate UPC reseller, we will not only match their price, but also beat it by 10%. In order for us to beat another seller’s price there are a few requirements that must be met as listed below:

– The UPC Seller with the lower price must sell legitimate and authentic UPC codes like we do.

– The UPC package quantity must be identical. For example, you cannot compare the pricing of a 500 UPC package to a 250 UPC package. The UPC packages must be in identical quantities as the price breakdown is different based on the quantity purchased.

To receive your 10% discount on a price match, please follow the instructions below:

1) Place your order with us first.
2) Contact us with the lower price that you have found, including in your message to us:
2a) Your Order # that you placed with us
2b) the package quantity that you found the lower price for
2c) the website where you found the lower price
3) We will respond within 1 business day and will refund you the difference in price, assuming the price match is with a legitimate reseller.

– Once we review your email, we will reply with the refund confirmation.

If you have any questions/concerns about the price matching process, please contact us.
